title: No One Will Save You
review: This movie has no dialogue, so it's kind of like a more approachable {Skinamarink}. I can't think of anything to say about it because I was a a bit ill and sleepy when I saw it. For me it flew by, and I was impressed with the bold design. How do you write something like this? Without dialogue to worry about, I suppose you could completely shape a movie in the editing room. It's worth watching if just to see a horror movie free from the usual tropes.
